summary:
• Board Changes: Three new independent directors appointed (Lindsay Wright, Vince Hawksworth, Tarek Robbiati) with effective dates of 1 August 2025 and 1 October 2025.
  • Departures: Gordon MacLeod steps down 1 September 2025; Sheridan Broadbent retires 1 October 2025 due to conflict of interest.
  • Governance Impact: New directors bring expertise in telecommunications, finance, infrastructure, and capital markets, signaling a strategic focus on transformation and shareholder value.

No material trading or capital markets actions identified (purely governance update).
